SE450: Requirements: Deliverable Schedule [10/12]

  1. 2008/10/21: Initial prototype (baseline/high risk). A working program implementing limited functionality.

    Your code must compile and test using the file:build.xml file from homeworks 1 and 3.

    Submit project-src.zip.

  2. 2008/10/28: Release 2.

    Your code must compile and test using the file:build.xml file from homeworks 1 and 3.

    Submit project-src.zip.

  3. 2008/11/04: Release 3.

    Your code must compile and test using the file:build.xml file from homeworks 1 and 3.

    Submit project-src.zip.

  4. 2008/11/11: Final release.

    Your code must compile and test using the file:build.xml file from homeworks 1 and 3.

    Test your project-src.zip file by unzipping it into a fresh directory and running ant. Make everything works.

    Submit project-src.zip.

    In class students must submit their written report on paper. You may leave it at the fourth floor office if you are unable to attend class.

    DL students may submit their report using the link provided online. You must submit a single file in PDF or DOC format. Do not submit a ZIP or other archive for your report. This requires that you somehow get diagrams into the report. Microsoft word and OpenOffice are very good at this. Please use one of them. In the worst case, print out your report and scan it in as a single PDF.
